You are probably in a blackout area for Reds games. While there are things you can do about it using VPN to fake your location, it’s not easy.

i have the I heart radio app on my phone. I listen to WLW 700 radio I heart radio through my Sonos. I can listen to the radio but when the Cincinnati red game comes on it says I am out of the listening area. What do i do?
